review.title: “A nice place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Good salaries,Nice team.Use of edge platforms and technologies for development and for servers environment.You can learn about new trends and technologies and apply them in your work.
review.cons: Cons – small offices, at least for marketing and development teamNot sure if it's a con, but like in any company of the real world you need to work more than 8 hours/day, some times at office and some times at home. even then you will have fun working with the team.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
